segments.text: I'm watching the kitchen unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying a plate, completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the sink is absolutely overflowing with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a waterfall pouring over the front edge of the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is streaming down the cabinet doors, making a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, her foot submerged, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains so calm, it's almost eerie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so unaware of such an obvious mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is still running, adding to the cascade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This water damage is going to be extensive if no one acts soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bizarre sight, this serene woman amidst the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the cold water seeping into my own shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn that faucet off.
segments.speaker: PAR
